definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.chinese: 請打出上部箱子中的信件。

sentences.english: The upper section of a classical building, resting on the columns and constituting the architrave, frieze, and cornice.
sentences.chinese: 柱頂盤，上橫樑一座古典的建築的上部，置於。

sentences.english: Bus room in the upper part of the post-breaker , bus-shaped goods were arranged.
sentences.chinese: 母線室在櫃體後上部，母線呈品形排列。

sentences.english: Install the jounce bumper on the upper spring mount.
sentences.chinese: 在上部彈簧固定處安裝避震器。

sentences.english: The openings to the upper heart chambers are visible.
sentences.chinese: 其上部心室外的開口處可明見。

sentences.english: Remove the upper flywheel and converter housing bolts and loosen the bottom bolts.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸上部飛輪及轉換器外殼螺栓，擰鬆底部螺栓。

sentences.english: The water surface in the cup is slightly vaulted upward.
sentences.chinese: 杯水的上部應該是凹面的。

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄層出現在楊莊組上部，具雙衆數結構。

sentences.english: Emission nebula Sharpless 249 fills the field at the upper left.
sentences.chinese: 發射星雲沙普利斯249瀰漫在圖像的左上部。

sentences.english: Oxygen, nitrogen and carbon monoxide molecules drift into the upper atmosphere, where solar radiation ionizes them.
sentences.chinese: 分子飄到大氣層上部時，會受太陽輻射而遊離。

sentences.english: The squeezed branch will break away from the soil above the squeezed branch when the load is big enough.
sentences.chinese: 荷載達到一定值時，支盤會與其上部土體發生脫離。

sentences.english: Drop your knees down to the right without allowing your body to follow.
sentences.chinese: 將雙膝向右側放下，同時身體上部不能隨之右轉。

sentences.english: The regenerator is above the cold trap.
sentences.chinese: 回熱器位於冷阱的上部。

sentences.english: The iron rod supports the valance is bent in an arc.
sentences.chinese: 掛窗簾上部短幔的鐵棍彎成了個弓形。

sentences.english: At the upper corners of the uterus, the fallopian (pronounced: fuh-lo-pee-un) tubes connect the uterus to the ovaries (pronounced: o-vuh-reez).
sentences.chinese: 在子宮的上部，輸卵管連接着子宮和卵巢。
